price: 53. Balobaki: Kobanga te, ya sólo, tozali kopesa yo sango ya muana mayele oyo atondi na bwanya.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashiruka bighulāmin ʿalīmin
